mapper.select: SELECT j.id as jobId, j.job_name as jobName, j.job_desc as jobDesc, j.`status` as `status`, j.prompt as prompt, j.interviewer_id as interviewerId, i.ai_name as interviewerName, j.create_time as createTime, j.updated_time as updateTime FROM job j LEFT JOIN interviewer i on j.interviewer_id = i.id ORDER BY j.updated_time DESC

SELECT j.id as jobId, j.job_name as jobName, j.job_desc as jobDesc, j.`status` as `status`, j.prompt as prompt, j.interviewer_id as interviewerId, i.ai_name as interviewerName, j.create_time as createTime, j.updated_time as updatedTime FROM job j LEFT JOIN interviewer i on j.interviewer_id = i.id WHERE j.id = #{jobId}
